briefTitle: Studying Tumor Tissue Samples From Patients With Early-Stage Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Correlation of Oncotype Dx With Image Features and Molecular Characteristics of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Differences in tumor morphology and molecular features that exist in good- and poor-prognosis breast cancer as determined by Oncotype Dx assay
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Diagnosis of early-stage breast cancer for which an Oncotype Dx assay has been performed
* Must have diagnostic H\&E stained tumor tissue samples available
* Hormone receptor status:

  * Estrogen receptor-positive tumor

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
